title: PLAT + SUPPORT AND MID NEEDED FOR RANKED 5s
body: We are looking for a mid and support for our ranked 5 team. Message me in-game for information, need to have a working microphone, aswell as Teamspeak 3. - xuzhinhen

replies.body: plat 5 supp main. Was plat 3 with low diamond elo last season. Have ts3, skype, curse, etc with working mic.
add me in game i main jungle/mid =] have alota 5s experience captained a team to plat last season, i finished season 4 on plat1 =].
